title: No leaks
content: The Tampax Pearl Tampons are perfect to keep me comfortable and leak free. I struggle with PCOS so my periods or irregular they can be super light or super heavy so being able to purchase a trio box instead of buying each size is great. I like that you can switch which ones you use on your lightest and heaviest days and even those medium days. They feel so light weight and comfortable, i even forget i have them in until i go to the bathroom.
